Title: Overcoming the limitations when using AI
Description:
Artificial intelligence is inherently imprecise, which poses significant challenges when integrating it into real-world applications. In this session, weâ€™ll explore practical strategies and proven techniques used in actual implementations to mitigate these challenges and harness AI effectively. The following open-source applications are covered: AIStoryBuildeers.com and BlazorData.net.

Session: Overcoming the limitations when using AI Speaker: Michael Washington
